kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=foodie, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '97', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Robot Hotel 6980", "category": "Chinese", "location": "Delhi", "contact": "8888888888"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
